body_html:
I'd prefer exposing the internal optimizer and wrapping instances, so users can do wrapped.opt.method when accessing a private method, and some boilerplate to forward the public Optimizer API methods.
…

body:
I'd prefer exposing the internal optimizer and wrapping instances, so users
can do wrapped.opt.method when accessing a private method, and some
boilerplate to forward the public Optimizer API methods.

On Mon, Oct 2, 2017 at 8:24 AM, Ilya Edrenkin <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> Yes, sure. In my opinion, this is slightly more obscure, but I can rewrite
> it in this way if you wish.
